body:
## Papyrus
Papyrus is a text editor with word prediction built with wxPython. It was inspired by the (now cancelled) Google Labs project, [Scribe](http://googleresearch.blogspot.com/2011/05/google-scribe-now-with-automatic-text_26.html).

### Features
* Tabbed editing
* Suggestions pulled from Google's autocomplete functionality

### Feature requests and bugs
Papyrus is at a very early stage in its development so feature requests and bug reports are encouraged. Feel free to file an issue on the Github issues page.
name: Papyrus
